is_ptr: This function returns whether a given variable is a pointer or not. In some cases you want to check and see what data type a variable holds in GameMaker Studio 2 and that's when you would use this function. It returns <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt> depending on whether the value is a pointer or not.
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it contains a pointer and if it is not then it shows a message in the debug console.
